properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and study areas. Our Winter Coat Exchange runs from October â€“ March. You can donate coats, or simply take one for free if you need it. Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning, iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/

properties.description: Beautiful Village Hall in the Village of Rose Ash. Coffee Mornings, Pub Nights, Film Nights available for hire or for local people to start their own community activities. Coffee Mornings every second Monday of the Month 10am-12 Film Nights every second friday of the Month doors open 7.00 film starts 7.30 Pub Nights every third Friday 7.30-11pm For other events see the web site
properties.title: Rose Ash Village Hall

properties.description: Join us throughout the autumn and winter for FREE refreshments (tea, coffee & biscuits, FREE self-led activities (jigsaws, board games, newspapers, magazines etc), FREE wifi, desks to work from and of course, book and audiobooks to read & borrow. We also have lots of groups to enjoy - for details of dates and times, just pop in.
